response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high value and quality, we believe it's worth more than $10,000 to you. After careful consideration, I propose a special introductory offer of $12,000 for this exceptional product. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the opportunity to secure an asset that could significantly benefit your endeavors. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of enhancing your operations with our product. If you have any questions or need further details, please don't hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 12000}
